description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Header' that displays the application's top header with title, subtitle, user info, and navigation links. It manages user and admin authentication state, handles logout actions, and reacts to storage events to sync state across tabs.

methods.name: Header({ title, subtitle })
methods.description: React functional component that renders the application header with user info, navigation, and logout controls.

methods.name: handleLogout
methods.description: Handles user logout by calling the logout service, clearing user state, and redirecting to login page.

methods.name: handleAdminLogout
methods.description: Handles admin user logout by calling the adminLogout service, clearing admin user state, and redirecting to admin login page.
